activities: We work on behalf of US Higher Education Universities to facilitate the admissions of international students wishing to study in the United States.  As part of this process, applicants are required to submit their personal information and government issued documents as part of the college admissions process.
address: 2 Seaport Ln, Suite 500, World Trade Center East
eucountries: Croatia, Czech Republic, Latvia, Romania, Slovakia, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, E-mail, mailing address, passport information, high school education transcript, college application and financial ability to pay tuition. This data is captured online and through offline data entry mechanisms. All data will be stored in electronic format, with online access.
